languages.text: На Эпитафии Соломон лицезрел, как его возлюбленн{mf|ый|ая} предает Человечество, и впервые в жизни лицо арбитра оросили слезы. Немыслимое горе разорвало его сердце, прежде чем участь куда более страшная смогла обрушиться на опустошенного проктора.

On Epitaph, Solomorne witnessed his beloved betray Humanity, and for the first time ever, the Arbitrator's face was wet with tears. The unimaginable grief burst the devastated Proctor's heart before an even more terrible fate could befall him.
languages.original_text: На Эпитафии Соломон лицезрел, как его возлюбленн{mf|ый|ая} предает Человечество, и впервые в жизни лицо арбитра оросили слезы. Немыслимое горе разорвало его сердце, прежде чем участь куда более страшная смогла обрушиться на опустошенного проктора.

traits.locale_text: On Epitaph, Solomorne witnessed his beloved betray Humankind, and for the first time ever, the Arbitrator's face was wet with tears. The unimaginable grief burst his heart before a much more terrible fate could befall the devastated proctor.

On Epitaph, Solomorne witnessed his beloved betray Humanity, and for the first time ever, the Arbitrator's face was wet with tears. The unimaginable grief burst the devastated Proctor's heart before an even more terrible fate could befall him.

languages.text: Auf Epitaph wurde Solomorne Zeuge, wie {mf|sein Geliebter|seine Geliebte} die Menschheit verriet, und zum ersten Mal befeuchteten Tränen das Gesicht des Arbitrators. Der unvorstellbare Schmerz zerbrach das Herz des todunglücklichen Proktors, bevor ihn ein noch schrecklicheres Schicksal ereilen konnte.
languages.original_text: On Epitaph, Solomorne witnessed his beloved betray Humanity, and for the first time ever, the Arbitrator's face was wet with tears. The unimaginable grief burst the devastated Proctor's heart before an even more terrible fate could befall him.

traits.locale_text: Auf Epitaph wurde Solomorne Zeuge, wie {mf|sein Geliebter|seine Geliebte} die Menschheit verriet, und zum ersten Mal befeuchteten Tränen das Gesicht des Arbitrators. Der unvorstellbare Schmerz zerbrach das Herz des todunglücklichen Proktors, bevor ihn ein noch schrecklicheres Schicksal ereilen konnte.

languages.text: Sur Épitaphe, Solomorne vit l'amour de sa vie trahir l'Humanité, et pour la première fois, le visage de l'arbitrator fut baigné de larmes. Le chagrin incommensurable qu'il ressentit alors lui brisa le cœur avant même qu'il ne subisse un sort encore plus terrible.
languages.original_text: On Epitaph, Solomorne witnessed his beloved betray Humanity, and for the first time ever, the Arbitrator's face was wet with tears. The unimaginable grief burst the devastated Proctor's heart before an even more terrible fate could befall him.

traits.locale_text: Sur Épitaphe, Solomorne vit l'amour de sa vie trahir l'Humanité, et pour la première fois, le visage de l'arbitrator fut baigné de larmes. Le chagrin incommensurable qu'il ressentit alors lui brisa le cœur avant même qu'il ne subisse un sort encore plus terrible.

languages.text: 在荒垄碑碣，索罗蒙亲眼目睹了他的爱人背叛人类的那一幕。有生以来第一次，泪水浸湿了这位法务官的脸庞，无法言喻的哀伤刺穿了他的心。在此之后，更加可怕的命运降临在了他的头上。
languages.original_text: On Epitaph, Solomorne witnessed his beloved betray Humanity, and for the first time ever, the Arbitrator's face was wet with tears. The unimaginable grief burst the devastated Proctor's heart before an even more terrible fate could befall him.

traits.locale_text: 在荒垄碑碣，索罗蒙亲眼目睹了他的爱人背叛人类的那一幕。有生以来第一次，泪水浸湿了这位法务官的脸庞，无法言喻的哀伤刺穿了他的心。在此之后，更加可怕的命运降临在了他的头上。
在荒垄碑碣，索罗蒙亲眼目睹了他的爱人背叛人类的那一幕。有史以来第一次，这位法务官的脸被泪水浸透了，无法言喻的哀伤刺穿了他的心。在此之后，更加可怕的命运降临在了他的头上。

languages.text: En Epitafio, Solomorne vio a su amad{mf|o|a} traicionar a la Humanidad y, por primera vez en su vida, las lágrimas humedecieron su rostro. Una pena inimaginable destrozó el corazón del desesperado Procurador antes de que pudiera sufrir un destino aún más espantoso.
languages.original_text: On Epitaph, Solomorne witnessed his beloved betray Humanity, and for the first time ever, the Arbitrator's face was wet with tears. The unimaginable grief burst the devastated Proctor's heart before an even more terrible fate could befall him.

traits.locale_text: En Epitafio, Solomorne vio a su amad{mf|o|a} traicionar a la Humanidad y, por primera vez en su vida, las lágrimas humedecieron su rostro. Una pena inimaginable destrozó el corazón del desesperado Procurador antes de que pudiera sufrir un destino aún más espantoso.

languages.text: エピタフで、ソロモーンは愛する者が人類を裏切るのを目撃した。アービトレイターの顔が涙で濡れたのはそれが初めてだった。想像を絶する悲しみが打ちひしがれた代理人の心を砕くと同時に、さらに恐ろしい運命が彼を襲おうとしていた。
languages.original_text: On Epitaph, Solomorne witnessed his beloved betray Humanity, and for the first time ever, the Arbitrator's face was wet with tears. The unimaginable grief burst the devastated Proctor's heart before an even more terrible fate could befall him.

traits.locale_text: エピタフで、ソロモーンは愛する者が人類を裏切るのを目撃した。アービトレイターの顔が涙で濡れたのはそれが初めてだった。想像を絶する悲しみが打ちひしがれた代理人の心を砕くと同時に、さらに恐ろしい運命が彼を襲おうとしていた。

languages.text: Sinyazıt'ta Solomorne, sevdiceğinin İnsanlığa ihanet ettiğine tanık oldu. Yargıcının yüzü ilk kez gözyaşlarıyla ıslandı. Üsteğmen'in hayal kırıklığına uğramış kalbi, daha da korkunç bir kaderle tanışamadan akla hayale sığmayan bir kederle paramparça oldu.
languages.original_text: On Epitaph, Solomorne witnessed his beloved betray Humanity, and for the first time ever, the Arbitrator's face was wet with tears. The unimaginable grief burst the devastated Proctor's heart before an even more terrible fate could befall him.

traits.locale_text: Sinyazıt'ta Solomorne, sevdiceğinin İnsanlığa ihanet ettiğine tanık oldu. Yargıcının yüzü ilk kez gözyaşlarıyla ıslandı. Üsteğmen'in hayal kırıklığına uğramış kalbi, daha da korkunç bir kaderle tanışamadan akla hayale sığmayan bir kederle paramparça oldu.
